title: Metabase - Views Overview
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the Metabase view logs.

definition.content:
**[Metabase](https://www.metabase.com/cloud/)** is an open-source business intelligence tool that you can connect to many popular databases. Metabase lets you ask questions about your data, and displays answers in formats that make sense, whether thatâ€™s a bar chart or a detailed table.

This dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of the Metabase view logs, offering insights about viewed resources.

For more information, see the [Metabase Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/metabase/).

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
